backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the chat backend, defining data types (Message, Chatroom, UserProfile, etc.) and implementing chatroom/message management, access control, blob storage, and HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a single feature (restoring MessageBubble action button styling from Version 335) to its affected file and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key implementation details of components, hooks, pages, and config files.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the React app with viewport/cache-busting meta tags and a versioned script tag loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditionally rendering Header and Footer based on the current route.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component allowing users to upload a custom image, select a GIF via Giphy search/trending, or remove their current avatar.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface component that renders filtered messages, handles auto-scroll and scroll-to-target-message, manages reply context, and composes MessageBubble, MessageInput, and PinnedVideo sub-components.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a card for a chatroom with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, live status badges, and metadata like participant count and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog form for creating a new chatroom with fields for topic, description, category, and media (image upload, video URL, or Twitter post), including validation and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/ExternalLinkDisc: Modal dialog that warns users they are leaving the app before navigating to an external URL, with Cancel and Continue actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying a copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with the Chattr logo, back-to-lobby navigation when inside a chatroom, and an inline username editor with avatar picker.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component that renders nothing; authentication is intentionally not used in this app.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders a single chat message bubble with support for text, images, GIFs, audio, emoji reactions, reply threading, pinning, and link detection.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input component supporting text messages, image uploads, voice recording, GIF search via Giphy, and auto-detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs in typed text.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Renders a pinned YouTube or Twitch video embed within a chatroom, with an unpin button that calls the useUnpinVideo mutation.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component for voice messages featuring a waveform visualization, play/pause toggle, seek slider, and playback time display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the latest stable value after the delay elapses.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that purges stale or empty cached chatroom data and forces a fresh refetch of the chatrooms query once the actor becomes ready, exposing a recovery-in-progress flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context (login, logout, identity state) via an AuthClient-backed React context and exposes a useInternetIdentity hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for chatroom and message operations, including fetching, searching, creating chatrooms, sending messages, reactions, and profile management against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives, defines light/dark theme CSS variables using OKLCH color space, and includes custom styles for mobile inputs, voice message range sliders, and layout constraints.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants including the Giphy API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Exports a single utility function `formatCompactNumber` that formats numbers into compact notation (k, M, B).
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search Giphy and fetch trending GIFs via the Giphy API, returning normalized GIF objects with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for lazy-loading the html2canvas library.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses image files using a canvas, skipping GIFs/SVGs and falling back to the original if compression increases file size.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON to extract safe preview fields (author, text, image) with in-flight deduplication and localStorage caching.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Implements a versioned localStorage cache for Twitter oEmbed preview data with 7-day expiration and cache key derivation from tweet IDs.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail fetching logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Twitter thumbnail caching layer.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility module providing functions to extract video/clip IDs and generate thumbnail/embed URLs for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter/X platforms.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity authentication provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Password-protected admin page that lists all chatrooms in a filterable table and allows deletion of individual chatrooms via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Page component that loads a specific chatroom by ID, increments its view count on load, and renders the ChatArea component; handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page displaying a searchable, category-filterable, algorithmically sorted list of chatrooms with a dialog to create new ones.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, animations, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the current fix request: reverting MessageBubble.tsx action button styling back to its Version 335 appearance.
